verbs.description: [ARG0: First lady Melania Trump] [V: donned] [ARG1: a FLOTUS cap] [ARGM-TMP: during a visit with President Trump to south Texas] [ARGM-TMP: on Aug. 29 , 2017 ,] [ARGM-PRP: to inspect widespread damage from Hurricane Harvey and ongoing relief efforts] .

[ARG0: First lady Melania Trump] donned a FLOTUS cap during a visit with President Trump to south Texas on Aug. 29 , 2017 , to [V: inspect] [ARG1: widespread damage from Hurricane Harvey and ongoing relief efforts] .
